summary: An insider's look at the gritty streets of New York City, seen through the eyes of street booksellers.
cast: Peter Whitney|Rick Sherman|Marvin|Everett Shapiro|Polish Joe|Al Mappo|Margueritte|Ron Harris|Jason Rosette|Zachary Aptekar|Thomas Dukleth|Allen Eisenberg|David Manso|Paul Rickert
title: BookWars
